sentences.english: A material handler in the downstream location is signaled to withdraw parts.
sentences.chinese: 位于下游的物料管理员收到领取零部件的信号。

sentences.english: Proper sealing and protection of material carton after usage or opening by IQC or warehouse operator.
sentences.chinese: IQC或仓管员开箱或取用物料后正确封箱和保护。

sentences.english: Are in-stock and in-process materials properly identified and controlled?
sentences.chinese: 是否对在仓库和在制程的物料进行适当地标识和控制？

sentences.english: A reservation of material based on an accepted order or system generated planned order.
sentences.chinese: 根据已接受订单或系统生成计划订单预留物料。

sentences.english: Unpacking and repacking of the production material.
sentences.chinese: 对生产物料进行拆箱和转换包装的工作。

sentences.english: Please get the dunnage materials prepared, otherwise we can't work tonight.
sentences.chinese: 请把垫舱物料准备好，否则今晚我们不能开工。

sentences.english: In this case, the MRP group is assigned to the material in the material master record.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下MRP组在物料主数据中被分配给物料。

sentences.english: In this case, the MRP group is assigned to the material in the material master record.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下MRP组在物料主数据中被分配给物料。

sentences.english: Does the facility have procedures and maintain records to monitor the raw materia vendors?
sentences.chinese: 工厂内有没有措施及记录来监控物料供应商的来料？

sentences.english: Roller mills grind essentially by crushing and attrition .
sentences.chinese: 辊磨机主要靠挤压和摩擦研碎物料。

sentences.english: The air oar can be immersed into and separated from material in accordance with actual condition.
sentences.chinese: 风桨可根据工艺需要埋入或离开物料。

sentences.english: Ouellette Machinery Systems, Inc. (OMS) is a leading manufacturer of automated product handling equipment.
sentences.chinese: 是自动化物料输送设备的领先制造商。

sentences.english: Substandard products in the warehouse shall be sent to and handled by the material assessment division as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 及时将仓库内不合格品交物料评审组评审处理。

sentences.english: Work Features◆It has wide application . It can transfer all flowing medium and non-running material.
sentences.chinese: 适应范围广，可输送一切流动介质甚至非流动物料。

sentences.english: The use of recovered solvents, mother liquors, and other recovered materials should be adequately documented.
sentences.chinese: 回收溶剂，母液和其它回收物料的使用应充分记录。

sentences.english: Little resistance during operation, capable of starting onload and conveying material at high speed.
sentences.chinese: 运行阻力小，能有载启动，可高速输送物料。

definition: to feed (a machine)/foreign goods (abbr. of 進口資料|进口资料)
aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
to load or unload/to transfer/to assemble and disassemble
